name: Charlotte Pudding
text: On Play: Look at the 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Sanji] or Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Sanji] or Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
